name: Badge of Courage
description: The Badge of Courage increases your Morale by +1 and confers Mind spell immunity (although the latter effect is undocumented).

name: Bird of Perception
description: This figurine increases your Eagle Eye skill by 5%.

name: Bow of Elven Cherrywood
description: This bow increases your Archery skill by 5%.

name: Cards of Prophecy
description: The Cards of Prophecy increase your Luck by +1.

name: Charm of Mana
description: This charm helps you recover 1 extra spell point per day.

name: Clover of Fortune
description: The Clover of Fortune increases your Luck by +1.

name: Crest of Valor
description: The Crest of Valor increases your Morale by +1.

name: Glyph of Gallantry
description: The Glyph of Gallantry increases your Morale by +1.

name: Hourglass of the Evil Hour
description: This item negates all Luck bonuses during combat for both you and your opponent.

name: Ladybird of Luck
description: The Ladybird of Luck increases your Luck by +1.

name: Legs of Legion
description: This item, when equipped by a hero in a town, increases the growth of your 2nd level units (in that town) by 5 per week.

name: Mystic Orb of Mana
description: This orb helps you recover 3 extra spell points per day.

name: Speculum
description: The Speculum increases your Scouting radius by +1.

name: Spirit of Oppression
description: This item negates all morale bonuses during combat for both you and your opponent.

name: Spyglass
description: The Spyglass increases your Scouting radius by +1.

name: Stoic Watchman
description: This figurine increases your Eagle Eye skill by 10%.

name: Talisman of Mana
description: This talisman helps you recover 2 extra spell points per day.

name: Bowstring of the Unicorn's Mane
description: This bowstring increases your Archery skill by 10%.

name: Emblem of Cognizance
description: This item increases your Eagle Eye skill by 15%.

name: Inexhaustible Cart of Lumber
description: When equipped, this cart provides you with an additional +1 Wood per day.

name: Inexhaustible Cart of Ore
description: When equipped, this cart provides you with an additional +1 Ore per day.

name: Loins of Legion
description: This item, when equipped by a hero in a town, increases the growth of your 3rd level units (in that town) by 4 per week.

name: Torso of Legion
description: This item, when equipped by a hero in a town, increases the growth of your 4th level units (in that town) by 3 per week.

name: Angel Feather Arrows
description: These arrows increase your Archery skill by 15%.

name: Arms of Legion
description: This item, when equipped by a hero in a town, increases the growth of your 5th level units (in that town) by 2 per week.

name: Endless Bag of Gold
description: When equipped, the Endless Bag of Gold increases your income by 750 gold per day.

name: Endless Purse of Gold
description: When equipped, the Endless Purse of Gold increases your income by 500 gold per day.

name: Everpouring Vial of Mercury
description: When equipped, this vial increases your Mercury production by +1 per day.

name: Golden Bow
description: When wielded, the Golden Bow allows your troops to shoot through any obstacle or at any range without penalty.

name: Head of Legion
description: This item, when equipped by a hero in a town, increases the growth of your 6th level units (in that town) by 1 per week.

name: Orb of Driving Rain
description: This powerful orb causes your Water spells to inflict an additional 50% damage.

name: Orb of Silt
description: This powerful orb causes your Earth spells to inflict an additional 50% damage.

name: Orb of Tempestuous Fire
description: This powerful orb causes your Fire spells to inflict an additional 50% damage.

name: Orb of the Firmament
description: This powerful orb causes your Air spells to inflict an additional 50% damage.

name: Shackles of War
description: When these shackles are wielded in combat, neither you nor your opponent may retreat or surrender.

name: Sphere of Permanence
description: Wielding this sphere renders your units immune to the Dispel spell.

name: Vial of Lifeblood
description: This item increases the health of all your units by +2.

name: Endless Sack of Gold
description: When equipped, the Endless Sack of Gold increases your income by 1000 gold per day.

name: Orb of Inhibition
description: This powerful orb prevents all spell casting in combat.

name: Orb of Vulnerability
description: During combat, this orb negates the natural magic resistance of all creatures on the battlefield.

name: Tome of Air Magic
description: This heavy book contains all spells in the school of Air Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available.

name: Tome of Earth Magic
description: This heavy book contains all spells in the school of Earth Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available.

name: Tome of Fire Magic
description: This heavy book contains all spells in the school of Fire Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available.

name: Tome of Water Magic
description: This heavy book contains all spells in the school of Water Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available.
